      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection()
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        For default data base configuration, Creates data base connection using following properties:
        1. db.driver.class
        2. db.connection.url
        3. db.user
        4. db.pwd
        Returns:
        Connection object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getConnection

        public static java.sql.Connection getConnection(java.lang.String prefix)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        If you want to use multiple data bases in the project. provide different configuration with different prefix. For example

        defualt

        1. db.driver.class
        2. db.connection.url
        3. db.user
        4. db.pwd

        another database configuration

        1. con1.db.driver.class
        2. con1.db.connection.url
        3. con1.db.user
        4. con1.db.pwd
        to use another configuration: getConnection("con1")
        Parameters:
        prefix - - prefix of the database configuration to be used
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        public static java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> getRecordAsMap(java.lang.String connectionPrefix,
